org.jetel.exception

Class StrictParserExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.exception.AbstractParserExceptionHandler
      • org.jetel.exception.StrictParserExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IParserExceptionHandler

    public class StrictParserExceptionHandler
extends AbstractParserExceptionHandler
    Parser exception handler with type "strict". Handled exception is only re-throwed.
